mean_en: a man who has been given a special honour by the king or queen and has the title Sir before his name; (in the Middle Ages) a man of high social rank who had a duty to fight for his king. Knights are often shown in pictures riding horses and wearing armour.
sentence: The knight protected our village from intruders.
sentence_trans: 骑士保护我们的村庄免于被入侵。
